short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple browser extension to manage tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Simple To-Do List Chrome Extension is your go-to tool for staying organized and boosting productivity. This intuitive extension lets you manage tasks effortlessly, ensuring you can keep track of your to-do list without ever leaving your browser. Whether it's for work, personal goals, or daily reminders, you can quickly add, edit, complete, and track tasks with ease. With features like task separation for pending and completed items, built-in search functionality, and local data storage to ensure your tasks are never lost, it offers a seamless and reliable way to stay on top of everything. Plus, track your task completion rate to stay motivated and improve productivity over time. Simplify your workflow and stay focused with this essential productivity companion!
